author: Daniel Lippman and Meridith McGraw
title: Inside the National Security Council, a rising sense of dread
description: As a lethal virus rampaged across China, White House aides urged more aggressive action.
content: Matthew Pottinger, a former Wall Street Journal reporter in China turned soldier turned Trump deputy national security adviser, was in charge, reporting up to his boss Robert OBrien. Anthony Ruggiero, a nuclear-weapons expert who was previously a think-tank s… [+2508 chars]
